texts.name: Wolfric
texts.biography: Good-natured Wolfric is someone to have around when spirits are down. He is vibrant, funny, and capable of telling a story better than any bard. In the moments before a battle, his jokes and taunts calm the nerves of inexperienced warriors, as well as rile the tempers of the enemy.
